TopicTitle: Embedded Live Stream Video Player in Game

Articles.Content:
Can anyone create a mod/plugin or anything that will add an embedded stream video link or video **PLAYER** link in the game like this link:

as a small window player in game

[http://www.ustream.tv/channel/iss-hdev-payload](http://www.ustream.tv/channel/iss-hdev-payload)

its with ISS HD cam Earth Viewing Experiment, its up 24/7

even if its a small window in game..but can be done ?

I want to keep an eye on that while i'm playing, alt+tab isnt nice ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)
